reviewtext: This does exactly what it is suppossed to do.  I can use it as a portable CB when I am out of the car or in the vehicle with an external CB antena while on the road.  Weather radio is a big plus as it comes in handy whether camping or in the house and expecting bad weather.  Good example - tornado season.  keep the radio with me when going to the basement for weather updates and if worst case happens, then still have comunication with the outside world.
